title: Project One
subtitle: Reason for developing Project One, what does it solve?

title: Scaling the Potential of Vertical Farming Going into 2025 and Beyond
subtitle: A look into the high-tech vertical farming industry, a possible new method for addressing urban food insecurity. A discussion between the tradeoffs of indoor and outdoor farming. How should we use data and technology? And how can we evaluate the potential impact?

title: Hoboken is Temporary
subtitle: An anthropological and proactive view of flooding's role to the current climate migration crisis. As a resident of Hoboken, a city that has often severe flooding, I look into how city planning is a decisive factor in public safety and flood risk outcomes.

title: AI’s Promise in Weather Forecasting: A Case Study
subtitle: Examining Machine Learning Weather Prediction (MLWP) as a transformative tool in meteorology, compared to the historic Numerical Weather Prediction (NWP) systems. MLWP delivers similar accuracy of forecasts compared to the top-rated NWP systems (like ECMWF) in a percentage of the time. Is AI the future of weather forecasting?

title: Reflection Opinion on Depop User Privacy Contract
subtitle: Discovered the user data and privacy contract contained critical information related to company rights with user data holding language of level 21.19 on the Flesh-Kincaid readability scale (designed for people with a masters education) and critically interpreted this as reason for social concern.

title: Influence of Wine on France and Vice Versa (French)
subtitle: Conducted research on French wine regions, varietals, and the controlled appellation of origin (AOC) system, gaining a thorough understanding of the unique characteristics and quality standards of French wines, with a particular discussion on the history of the French regulatory system translating into modern-day worldwide impact.

title: Technosocial Gender Constructs and Class Exploitation
subtitle: I explored the evolution of technology, from Leibniz’s calculator to the platform economy, highlighting its impact on society, labor, gender roles, and the ethical dilemmas posed by capitalist exploitation.

title: Asteroid Activity in the Solar System
subtitle: Understanding planetary science through solar system history reveals how gravitational laws shaped celestial bodies. Analyzing asteroid orbits and perturbations uncovers solar system formation and potential future impacts.
